channel.title: Outreaches on IID Group
channel.description: Recent content in Outreaches on IID Group

item.title: Outreach
item.description: Tutorials ICML 2020 Tutorial on Submodular Optimization: From Discrete to Continuous and Back ISIT 2018 tutorial on “Submodularity in Information and Data Science”. Videos: Part One Slides: Part One, Part Two. CVPR 2018 tutorial “Big Data Summarization: Algorithms and Applications” in CVPR 2018. Videos: Part One, Part Two. Slides: Part One, Part Two. Workshops Amin Karbasi joint with Yaron Singer, Jeff A Bilmes, Andreas Krause, and Stefanie Jegelka, organized Discrete Structures in Machine Learning workshop at NIPS 2017.
